reviewText: Great stories for children and adults. My grand daughters and enjoy the trilogy. they never seem to grow old. _
Disc 2 (Prince Caspian) does not play because it has the wrong region code.  It seems clear this is a more of a systemic problem with the boxed set.

This is due to the fact that both CDs of Prince Caspian will not play "because of the region code"! This sucks that they would stick these unplayable disks sandwiched between 1 & 3 so I WANT MY MONEY BACK OR REPLACE THESE 2 DISKS THAT WILL NOT PLAY! If there was a zero rating, I'd have chosen that one!
only one of three discs work without issue. one of the three doesn't work at all due to some sort of regional setting issue. we can get the third disc to work, eventually.
I can not play the second movie prince caspian due to wrong region.  They did not come with Disney codes.

Only the 1st and 3rd movies are universal region codes. "Prince Caspian" is only able to play on blu-ray players programmed with the B region code. Amazon.com needs to change the way they define region codes for Blu-rays, because it is not the same as dvds.
If you do not have a DVD player that is region free...do not buy this trilogy! I learned the hard way! Very unhappy!
For some reason, the 2nd movie was a European DVD, instead of a Blu-Ray, but I sent it to Disney, and they sent the correct Blu-Ray version to us. Everything worked out well!
Disc 2 doesn't work, due to region code restriction :-(
I can't get this damn thing to play in AMERICA lol it doesn't play in American Blu-Ray players so if your gonna buy this make sure it isn't the REGION LOCKED version!

There is no logical reason to sell a trilogy with varying region formats and not inform the consumer, unless the intention is fraud. That is the case with this purchase. Buyers beware, Prince Caspian is the wrong region format for players in Canada or US. Nowhere in their product description do they advise that one of the three movies is of a different region and will not work in your North American blu Ray player. This is a case of fraud and Amazon should remove this product. I had a very disappointed family member Christmas morning.
does not work in the USA
My Husband has ALS and watches movies all day. He wanted this to add to his collection.

There is no valid reason to have a boxed set of blu-rays - together - with one of the discs unable to play on most USA machines.  There is no excuse for that.  It's like going to the dealership to buy a car, and putting water in the gas tank!  If a person purchases the set, that person INTENDS to watch all three discs on the same machine, in almost EVERY case.
Discs 2 & 3 were not USA compatible.  Had to send it back.

The product details does mention the region code as B/2 which includes Europe, Greenland, French territories, Middle East, Africa, Australia and New Zealand. Unsure why the bad review due to unable to view 1 of the discs due to region problem when it is mentioned. You can view this prior to purchasing.

We bought these as a gift for our daughter to have her own set.  We just recently decided to watch her set and found that Prince Caspian will not play due to it being in Region Code B.  WHY would you even sell a set with varying region codes!!!!!  Completely useless DVD.  Since we purchased it months ago we cannot even return it for refund.  First really BAD deal I've received from Amazon.
Did not work with my Blu-ray. Had to return
Two DVDs played, but one did not.  Could do better at letting customers know about zoning.  Otherwise, product was good and well packaged.

PLEASE READ!!!!  Unfortunately, I didn't read the reviews before I purchased mine - the 2nd disc (Prince Caspian) is REGION B ONLY and cannot be played if you have a U.S. specs Blu-ray player.  A total loss since disc one & three are ALL REGION (A,B, & C) capable.
Will not play in the USA

The lion which and the wardrobe and The voyage of the dawn treader both are ABC zoned
But Prince Caspian is only zone B Which is out of the United States
I had to send this back because it was not compatable with my dvd player.
One of the movies I received in the pack doesn't play in the USA on our playstation 3.
This okay but second movie won't play
One of the DVDs was for the wrong region.
2 movies don't play on my player! i love the movies however
